website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice for those seeking an inexpensive self-propelled mower.
pros: Features blade brake and foldable handle
Great price for a self-propelled mower
cons: The bag that comes with this option is on the small side
Some problems have been reported with the crank shaft easily bending

customer_reviews.title: I like the ease of it while in operation and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I view this as the BMW of lawnmowers-it's solid. I like the ease of it while in operation and it folds down quickly when it's time to put it away. It works like a champ so if you're in the market for a lawnmower- consider it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Young

customer_reviews.title: My first mow was against grass that was easily over a foot tall and this cut straight through ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. After breaking my 2nd electric mower I bought this. My first mow was against grass that was easily over a foot tall and this cut straight through it like it wasn't there. I was immediately slapping myself for ever going electric. I cannot stress the difference enough. I didn't think Id use the variable speed as much as I do but its actually pretty sweet. Pull start seems smooth and easy to start. Cuts seem really consistent in height. Idk what else to say other than I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tagifras

customer_reviews.title: It's a Honda
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to do the final assembly. Raise and lock handle put oil and gas in and started on first pull. Cuts great and the rear self propel feature is superior to my old FWD mower. Makes cutting the back Hill a snap. Highly recommend this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honda quality at a budget price
customer_reviews.text: This model is the updated 2018 model with improved tire traction. It starts immediately if cold but if it's warmed up it may take 2 or 3 pulls to restart. If you don't bag or mulch clippings, they are simply dispersed from the rear of the mower, covering your shoes and ankles with grass as you walk behind it. The engine runs at one speed but the driving speed is variable using thumb paddles on the handle which take a little getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bokum

customer_reviews.title: Wow I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Honda self-propelled mower. My first ran for over 15 years! It has plenty of horsepower, great mulching ability, easy to maintain, cheap to run and best of all, it starts the first time every time! Its a solid feeling mower with a 21" blade. It fits my mowing needs perfectly. Oh, by the way, I'm a 66 year old woman.
customer_reviews.author: Leith A. Masters

customer_reviews.title: Seized engine after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This mower was working perfectly for the first 2 months of use until the engine seized in the middle of mowing one Saturday afternoon. The mower has not worked since. Complete waste of $400.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H. Jans

customer_reviews.title: Engine runs good - worst cut ever though.
customer_reviews.text: Honda engine starts every time and seems to run strong. I have only owned the mower for 3 months. The cut quality is horrible compared to other brands. Honda will leave way more un-cut blades of grass and the overall look is bad. It requires you to almost most your yard twice to get it cut correctly. I don't want to go buy another mower until this one quits but just the cut quality alone makes me want to get rid of it for my clients benifits and speed up my efficiencies. Will be going back to Toro product very soon i see in my future.
customer_reviews.author: J. Noble

customer_reviews.title: EASY!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 59 year old woman that has a rather large sloped lawn to mow. I love this mower. I followed the instructions for adding the oil, added gas and off I went. After I got the hang of the how to use the smart drive when I need the mower to give itself a little push, I could mow my lawn with one hand if I wanted, and sometimes have too when I'm under my appl trees. AND it starts the first pull! I have now mowed the lawn 3 times this summer since I got this mower, and everytime I use it I like it more.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase this year. Starts easy ever time and is very easy to use. Can't find anything bad to say about this unit and the price was great too. I cut a whole acre with this mower and it typically takes me about three hours, maybe four if the grass is really high, since I have to empty the bag a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Costs a bit more than the Honda-Other hybrids (Honda engine, some cheaper chassis), but worth it. The self-propel thumb lever takes some getting used to. This machine is quite light and easy to push even without the self-propelling. The double blades made short work of the leaves in the fall. Pros: Excellent quality, designed for durability, gas-efficient engine. Cons: Auto-choke is harder to start than my previous manual-choke Honda. My previous machine needed one pull.
customer_reviews.author: Narlothep

customer_reviews.title: Research, Research, Research
customer_reviews.text: Research, research, research. That is the key to finding the perfect mower. Took me a long time to find the perfect mower. Took it out of the box tonight. Filled it with the included oil. Added gas and away I went. Left perfect lines and cleaned up very well. Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

customer_reviews.title: My lawn looks like it was cut with a laser!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I dislike. This is not the electric-start model, and since it starts with a GENTLE pull the first time, I don't need that. Caveat: READ THE INSTRUCTIONS. This isn't your grandfather's (or your dad's) lawnmower. You'll be happy. I know two other people with this mower, and they are glad I recommended it. (I had nobody to help lift it out of the box, so I simply cut down the sides at one end and rolled it out.)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Honda reliability and quality Good mulching Plenty of speed Cons: High compression makes it hard to pull starter cord. Sometimes takes 3 or more pulls to start. Rear wheel drive makes it hard to work in tight places. Rear wheel drive makes it hard to make tight turns. Hard to pull backwards even when drive disengaged.
customer_reviews.author: dmmusic

customer_reviews.title: Just go to your local store.
customer_reviews.text: This came damaged. It basically had no packaging to keep it safe. One of the wheel brackets got bent. And there was oil all over everything. I have to send it back now and I'm dreading that whole process.
customer_reviews.author: Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lawnmower I've ever owned. My previous lawn mower was a Troy-Bilt self-propelled and it was constantly getting clogged with grass. So far with this lawn mower I haven't had any problems with it getting clogged in tall grass and the self-propelled part seems a little bit heavier duty as well as the chassis itself seems to be built of much heavier Duty metal. Overall it just seems to be built much more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: TheGeek

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk/useless warranty
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience ever. We bought two lawn mowers with a warranty for each. We bought them just before winter ended so we weren’t able to use them for a little while. When we brought them out to mow the lawn, we discovered that one was broken and the other was difficult to start. Tried to call amazon, they redirected us to Honda. Tried to call honda, they redirected us to amazon. The warranty is beyond useless, and we even purchased the longer warranty. We didn’t even get through an entire summer with these lawn mowers. We’re pretty upset with the product and the customer service that is impossible to get
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best mower I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Had this mower for about one year and my conclusion (like some other reviewers) is that this thing is a beast. I don't want to go overboard with the superlatives but the Japanese have most definitely earned their reputation for high quality engineering and manufacture of these types of products. I can foresee this mower lasting many years with basic regular maintenance. Great ergonomics and a first pull start every time. It assembled very easily and as with any new tool it took a few tries to decide how to set the features to my liking. If you are in the market for a self-propelled walk behind mower this is ideal for any average, mid-sized suburban plot. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Best lawnmower..
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lawnmower I've ever owned. It starts up quickly and the self proppeled feature works as advertised. I don't have anything negative to say besides the price but other than that it simply does the job and with two blades my lawn looks amazing. I had a Toro and it was okay but it was way to heavy compare to the Honda.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Most Reliable Mower Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best 21" mower I've ever used. Unboxed/Fueled/Oiled and started 1st pull out of the box. I bought this mower to replace my older Honda HRR21, I've used this mower professionally daily and it still runs strong and starts 1st pull every time. I actually wore the tread off the wheels. No problems ever with this mower. This is a great machine, fast for its size and cuts clean even at a fast pace. Take it from a pro...BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Jaysun

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Used this mower for the majority of the Summer. The thing that I loved most about it is that it started the first time with every pull to where my 10 year old could start it and its self propelled which wasnt even considered when I buy it. The bagger worked great which I used a few times otherwise I always use mulch which also did a great job and only left larger clumps of grass if I didn't mow for longer than a week and the grass got too tall. Would recommend this mower to anyone looking for a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: This mower starts easily, has a much better cut than the cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a Honda mower for some time but always ended up buying a cheaper model which would only last a couple of years. This mower starts easily, has a much better cut than the cheaper ones and has a well designed variable assist control. I have a smaller yard and this mower is perfect for what I need. Plus the price is not much more than much cheaper models. Delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this lawnmower however it does have a few faults, which is surprising being a Honda and all. Firsts the self propelled feature is awkward to use since you have to use a constant pressure on the lever controlling the speed. This is difficult when you are maneuvering the unit so its rather jerky. Also, the motor is not as powerful as my prior Honda. Four inch grass was a bit too much for it and you couldn't take a full cut but had to nibble away at it. Weird not having a throttle or a choke but it starts readily and stops quickly.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Must go slow !
customer_reviews.text: Cuts short grass very well but anything over 3 inches and it misses grass , you have to go over again
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: You will love it
customer_reviews.text: After owning a Troy built and a Toro you can feel the quality of this honda the moment you touch it it is made so much better. I took it from the box added oil and gas and it started on the first pull. Thanks Honda for making a quality produy
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I love my mower.
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned the top of the line mowers riders and self propelled. This mower cuts well. Easy to start. Goes faster than i can walk sometimes. Pulls like a mule. Is quite. Sips gas. Leaves the lawn looking like a pro did it. Anybody complaining about this mower is either lazy, misinformed or entitled beyond doing yardwork. Took me 10 minutes to get it from the box to the first stripe cut. If you cant operate this mower just get a lawn service to do it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: junl
customer_reviews.text: I do like the way it was put together fronts wheels are not the same height and not because of the adjustments on how to raise or lower it the mower was not level the right wheel did not the ground as the left when trying to fix it found the left had been stripped out and couldn't be adjusted would not buy another one I would pau two hundred more and get another Snapper ninja
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Porter

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. yes it mows great but the right front wheel is 1/8 of an inch higher than the rest it doesn't even turn in flat surface. Nothing appears to be bent or any shipping damage. No more honda lawn mowers for me.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mower
customer_reviews.text: Starts every time on the first pull, easy to push, and absolutely zero problems after two months of use. The mulch feature works awesome too. It really chops things up small!
customer_reviews.author: DL Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.  It really does start on the first pull!
customer_reviews.text: If only my other power equipment started so dependably. My only quibble is that wet grass can pretty quickly collect under the deck and then the mower starts dropping chunks of it on the lawn. However, I expect this happens to ANY mulching mower when used on wet grass. The clogged wet grass can be easily hosed out from under the deck. And then!! It still starts on the first pull!!
customer_reviews.author: Horizon

customer_reviews.title: Performance/ Ascetics
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mower to cut up half an Acre and i had no problems what-so-ever. Supplied with engine oil, Mulching/ Bagging options, Started on the first pull and the Setup took no time at all (excluding the manual for safety measures). Just make sure you let the mower cool down before you throw it back in the shed/ garage (where the gas and propane are stored,lol). Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: JustMoon

customer_reviews.title: Honda Quality
customer_reviews.text: Lawnmower was received without any issues, very well packaged. Removed from box, added supplied oil, filled fuel tank, cranked up as expected. I love the fuel shut off valve, every piece of lawn equipment should have one. Self propelled feature is very nice, speed is easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: This machine is a breeze to start. It does ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a breeze to start. It does not clog up on wet grass. One pull of the chain and away she goes. It is light weight and ideal for lawns up to 1/2 acre.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Brierly

customer_reviews.title: Great mower, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've learned that a rear-wheel drive self-propelled mower is best for my sloping hillside yard. For the past five years I had a Husqvarna with the same Honda GCV engine. It was still running, but I decided to replace it early. This new Honda model is much easier to use. Each wheel has a secure height adjuster, the throttle thumb paddles work fine and adjust speed by adding or lessening pressure. The handle folds down with two spring loaded pull pins. The mulch or bag option selector is straightforward. The automatic choke works like a charm. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Solid, reliable mower
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy to start, hasn't had a single hiccup since buying it, and it runs great. The variable-speed throttle is a little sensitive, but you'll get used to it. Maintenance is also very easy, which is a big plus. The twin blades are as efficient at mulching as advertised. It dices short grass into dust, and even long grass is barely noticeable once this thing is done with it. The mower also handles dead leaves pretty well, reducing the space they take in your paper yard bags, which is a nice little bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Aris

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with the quality of this lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with the quality of this lawnmower. I've mowed my 0.6 acre lawn four times on one gallon of gas (no exaggeration.)
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can return  it like say Homedepot
customer_reviews.text: Have to mow lawn almost twice it leaves so many uncut strips. Plus rear wheels won’t spin backwards because of frozen drive shaft bushings 1 year old. Should have gotten another Snapper ninga
customer_reviews.author: barry schiel

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This mower will mow the yard for you. Little effort is needed and it has a mulcher and a grass bag catcher if you are so inclined. It started the first time I pulled the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Koehne

customer_reviews.title: I like the torque of the engine.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the power of the engine and how easy it was to start. I also like the paddle system that propelled the mower. It mowed right through thick tall grass like it was nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Dwane

customer_reviews.title: started SOOOO easy..
customer_reviews.text: Ready to go right out of the box!!! NO assembly required...just flip the handle into place....started SOOOO easy....that's my favorite part! level adjuster is user friendly...very happy with this mower!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for my dad, and he LOVES it!!! He is 87 years old, insists on mowing his own lawn, and his old lawnmower was very hard to push. This one starts right away and he basically walks behind it. Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E.

customer_reviews.title: My husband is most impressed
customer_reviews.text: He loves this new mower. It's quick and easy and does so many things like mulch, etc., that our other one didn't. It was ready to go when we got it except for gas and oil. Couldn't have asked for a better deal
customer_reviews.author: Jeri C. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Adjust the wheels. They came on the lowest setting and that is way too low. Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 70 yr. old woman and I was able to unpack and get this mower set up and running. Started on the first pull and was the easiest pull start I've ever used. Wasn't impressed with FedEx. They left the box sitting in front of my garage, never rang the bell. Anyone could have drove in and made off with it. They also did not position the box "this side up" Instead it was sitting on its end. Not with the "right side up".
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McKee

customer_reviews.title: Mower doesn’t run after 3 mowings!
customer_reviews.text: Mower worked first three times we used it and then will no longer start. Haven’t heard from seller. Tomorrow we will have to file a claim with Amazon. Don’t recommend buying this mower!
customer_reviews.author: RRamer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mower. Honda has made lawn mowing easy with this one. I have a large front and back yard that requires mowing. Both are less than smooth and have inclines. This thing handles the yards with ease. If you are even considering it, get this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE this mower!
customer_reviews.text: When they say 'Easy Start' - they mean it! I broke my shoulder in a car accident years ago, and I can't usually pull the cord fast or hard enough to start a mower. But this one is so easy, I have NO trouble getting it to start! Love that you can bag or mulch your grass too! GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: BK - Walled Lake, MI

customer_reviews.title: Honda is quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unbox. Put oil in then filled gas tank. One pull and mower fired up ready to tackle my yard.
customer_reviews.author: sophie's dad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. Quality cutting of grass. Decent size bag. Easy to start. Simple to setup.
customer_reviews.author: MDubya

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I hated the lawn mowing work used to be (with my last mower -- battery powered). it always painful and dirty to me. until I switch to gas engine one. it's supper awesome to handle case easily. but I just started, maybe I will get boring with oil change and maintenance. :) For now, I give it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Hotwinter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: OK first summer with new mower and couldn't be happier with my purchase. First oil change was a bit longer than recommend but the oils viscosity was still good so am confident the extra 3 or 4 hours of running it prior to change had no effect. Until you mow with a quality lawnmower like this you don't realize just how shabby all previous mowers were.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance Just As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Have now used this a few times and love it. Started on first pull out of the box once I put the oil and gas into it. The variable speed self propel takes a little getting used to especially on hilly terrain, but overall this mower is exactly what I expected and performs just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Rumley

customer_reviews.title: it runs smooth not that noisy I cant be more happy
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it, it runs smooth not that noisy I cant be more happy
customer_reviews.author: MiTo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 3 months and I'm loving it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mower as a home warming gift for my son. He loves it. My husband also has one he purchased some years ago. I use it to mow also. Very easy to start, easy to maneuver, has been reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: I. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Honda HRR216K9VKA 3-in-1 Variable Speed Self-Propelled Gas Mower with Auto Choke
customer_reviews.text: Great lawnmower starts 1 pull had in for over 6 months it sucks trying to pull it backward way to heavy, The engine is great but as i said way to heavy I would have never bought it knowing it was like a battle tank to hand push it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee W.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Doing review after owning it for a year. Still works exactly the same as the day I got it. This is worth the extra money that you pay. Don't waste time with cheaper ones, just get the proper machine you'll thank yourself later.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very good mower, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great mower, but wait for sale at Home Depot. You’ll get a much better price. Fortunately, I didn’t need to return it for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great solid mower.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those mowers you can just tell will last you 20 years. It is heavy so be prepared
customer_reviews.author: J. Hampson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Lawn Mower
customer_reviews.text: No assembly, 1 pull start, Rips threw the lawn like a Monster Mud truck, laughing at whatever you mow over. Don't waste your time an money on a battery ecologically friendly mower. Get a Honda lawnmower and spend more time watching your grass grow instead of mowing it.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Stop to work in the second year
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to buy a reliable mower and paid more than $400 for it. It stopped work because of auto choke (I guessed). I have checked or replaced oil level, gas and spark plug, etc. Nothing worked. Seller said it has been expired of return date and suggested me to contact Honda. Really disappointed. I would had hired a contractor to do the lawn work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Best mower I have owned...and I have owned a lot!
customer_reviews.author: JimM

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT MOWER
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Mower! I checked Consumer Reports website before buying it and it had a very high rating! Excellent Mower!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kelly

customer_reviews.title: horrible costumer service
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 1 summer and then 2nd summer kept dying . Well summer 3 it won't run at all. I have a 3 year warranty and this seller is making me jump through hoops trying to get a replacement. Don't buy from them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tar

customer_reviews.title: Runs like a Honda
customer_reviews.text: Works great, starts on the first or second pull every time. Very nice cut, haven’t seen any left over clippings while mulching. The self propelled feature does take some getting use to but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Moparnik

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: My previous mower was a Murray that I had for about 25 yrs. It was not self propelled nor did it have mulching capability. This new mower has both and I really like both features. So far it has always started with one pull.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase! Works flawlessly, drop shipped to my door without any issues. Simply unpacked, added INCLUDED oil, some 87 octane gas and off and running! Pull start is so easy my mother could handle it! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicious Sid

customer_reviews.title: easy to puch
customer_reviews.text: I used it all summer and it does a great job up and down hill
customer_reviews.author: Iris Anspach

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower!
customer_reviews.text: Great Honda mower! Delivered as expected and was exactly as described! Compared it to mower from Costco and this one is better!
customer_reviews.author: james p cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best lawnmower I've had the chance to use. The setup was a snap, and it starts on the first pull. While I prefer mulching, it's nice to have the option to bag. I highly recommend this mower!
customer_reviews.author: From DetroitTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need only thing missing is fresh gasoline
customer_reviews.text: The best mower I have ever purchased. If you are looking to buy a new mower this is a super gr8 deal
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews and being that it is a Honda I didnt mind spending the extra few bucks. It was fine for first 3 to 4 times I used it but after the first winter it just wont start now. Oh yeah I changed the oil like i was supposed to etc etc Buy a cheaper american one
customer_reviews.author: Amar

customer_reviews.title: a truly great mower. The cut is great and it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: This mower is everything that they said it was, a truly great mower. The cut is great and it makes the yard look really good. It starts easy, and the bag is easy to remove and reinstall. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great power lawnmower that propels itself
customer_reviews.text: You can push this mower up a small hillside that lets you do a big job quickly and well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Weston

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine. I love Honda brand
customer_reviews.text: My first I buy this Honda lawn mover. Very good machine. I love Honda brand. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HOA V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy mower
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower. Not sure I've ever been so excited about a lawn mower. Used it 4 times now. Easy pull start. Easy change to bag or mulch. Easy height adjustment. And EASY mowing with the variable speed. Love it. Plus, it's a Honda and should last forever if taken care of!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Everything you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Simple, and works great. Started on first pull and I believe, in 6 or 7 uses, has continued the 1 pull streak of starts. The variable speed self-propelled design can really save time. All good.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: I like this mower but let's see how I feel once I have it for a little while
customer_reviews.text: It starts real easy. One pull and it flows. It picks up leaves well and adjusting it to different levels is great. There is a little hesitation going up hills while still cutting and maintaining throttle control but that is a minor hiccup
customer_reviews.author: Renita Knight

customer_reviews.title: Works great the only bad thing is we recieved the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great the only bad thing is we recieved the bag that looks like there was a rip and sewed
customer_reviews.author: Zvitok

customer_reviews.title: Still runs great!
customer_reviews.text: Started first pull out of the box ! Had the older model lasted 15 years gave to son...Still runs great!
customer_reviews.author: Infantryman

customer_reviews.title: Lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: So far, the mower has performed excellently. Starts right up and is good on gas usage.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Quality - Quality - Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great and amazing machine, very good in maneuvering around curves and the variable speeds makes it easy to control at your own paste. very good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Swan Male

customer_reviews.title: The best lawn mower I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best lawn mower I've ever owned. No need to bag anymore. The grass mulches up great, as long as you don't let it get too long. Easy start and love the variable speed self propelled.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A HONDA, Nuf said.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that takes getting used to is it's Rear Wheel drive, it is powerful so keeping the front wheels on the ground takes practice.
customer_reviews.author: Rondo

customer_reviews.title: Beast!
customer_reviews.text: This mower is a beast! I previously had a Toro that would bog down and shut off in the tall grass. This Honda powers through that same tall grass with no issues. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mower since April and it is great. I recommend don't bargain shop for a cheap mower, you will pay for it at maintenance time and finding the right parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good mulching mower and great all wheel drive.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a mower that would handle mulching of leaves. We have three large tulip poplars that are prone to earlier leaf drop in hot weather. First cutting seemed to do ok. Nothing short of a big wind or expensive lawn sweeper would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Joe

customer_reviews.title: For the Price....nothing better!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for excellent machine!!! Honda engine that purrs and cuts through anything!! Last mower use to stop on heavy areas, not this one!! Saves ur back with powerful self drive!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: The throttle takes a while to get used to. If you don’t watch out, you’ll pop a few wheelies
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Van Der Hurst

customer_reviews.title: It’s mulching ability seems to diminish with time
customer_reviews.text: At first it mulched perfectly. The last two times though, it keeps leaving clumps of grass (unmulched); this happens most near the left rear wheel. I end up having to cut my grass twice, in order to get rid of the clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo G.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this mower
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good mower. We've only owned it a short time but it starts up the first pull every time. The variable speed is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. After 1 year it will not run.
customer_reviews.text: Good mower and good service from the vendor. I would like the mower more if it had a way to disengage the transmission for backing up. Update- 8/5/2020 Mower wheels lock up when pulling backwards. Oil leaking from the air cleaner. Getting ready to call Honda about warranty. I would not buy this mower again and I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Butler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product !!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to maintain and to use. Does a nice job on our large hilly property.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Boldt

customer_reviews.title: Best Mower I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This mower is great. Starts everytime on the first pull and mulches like a champ. My lawn looks great. The wheels adjust one at a time but it's not really a problem. The Self propel really has a lot of power.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Calandrelli

customer_reviews.title: It's a Honda!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So easy to use start and use. Leaves the lawn looking beautiful. Love the bag attachment so no raking the grass! Would buy another Honda home product.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. Built to Last. This one gets top marks. If you are looking for mower, this is the one. Easy set up. Take it out of the box, extend the handle. add oil (supplied) and gas. Started on the first pull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mower. Lots of power and easy to use self-propelled throttle.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: ease of start and power
customer_reviews.text: it starts on 1st pull, the gras is mulched perfectly and deliver was right into my garage!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Blendell

customer_reviews.title: Good mower!
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a 13 year old Honda HRT216 model, which is still running first pull.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Johnson

customer_reviews.title: right stuff
customer_reviews.text: works well, first time I have had a mulcher and it is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Maine

customer_reviews.title: Lawnmowers
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower. Easy start and fully adjustable. I would recommend this mower to my fellow shoppers for a good reliable mower
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: The mower arrived as expected. Beautifully packed, so no damage while in transit. Happy with the machine!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Benavides

product_meta.title: Honda HRR216K9VKA 3-in-1 Variable Speed Self-Propelled Gas Mower with Auto Choke
product_meta.description: Smart Drive - Variable Speed 0 to 4 mph., Mulch, Bag, Discharge. No Tools or attachments needed, Micro cut Twin Blades - For an ultra fine cut for mulching and bagging, 12ga Steel Deck, Easy to Start GCV160 Engine. CARB and EPA Compliant, Auto Choke, 2-Position Handle, or fold for easy storage, 8-inch Ball Bearing Wheels, 6 Position Cutting Height Adjustments 1-1/8" - 4", 2.4 Bushel Bag, Foam Grip Handles, Zone Start Safety System - kills engine when you let go of flywheel lever Manual Fuel Shut Off.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars396 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
